description:
Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Caesar o Hokaku-seyo - General Canon Sakuretsu
Цезарь схвачен! Залп из Генеральской Пушки!
シーザーを捕獲せよ 将軍砲[ジェネラルキャノン]炸裂
